Html:
(I am getting a Typescript error code 3)

What does this mean? - How do I fix it?

There is very little description (if any) of the errors when they occur,

What are the Typescript error codes and their meaning?

If you have a repro and further details (e.g. is this in Visual Studio or the command-line?) can you post it on the issue tracker and we'll try and get to the bottom of it.  Generally when the product has an error you should get a decent error message.

Thanks,

 - Bill
